String.string:
Defeat boss monsters 1 time in Gardan's Trial.

You can use the request 'Complete Gardan's Trial' in Vanguard Requests (shortcut 'H') to teleport to Highwatch. Talk to Anke, the Ace Dungeon Instructor, to enter the Ace Dungeon.

You can only enter the dungeon once you've spoken to Anke and chosen a test exercise.
